casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Dane LOCKLEAR, Jr. No. 578A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 31, 2008. William P. Hart, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, William B. Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of January 2008 by Defendant to Amend Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 31 st day of January 2008."
